item.title: How To Mute and Hide Threads on Twitter
item.description: Twitter gives users the ability to mute content from being shown on their timeline. Learn how you can mute words to hide threads on Twitter.

item.title: Contact
item.description: .post-meta { display: none; } form { width: 100%; } input { width: 100%; padding: 10px; margin: 14px 0; padding-inline-start: var(--radius); overflow-x: hidden; border-radius: var(--radius); background: var(--code-bg); color: var(--primary); border: 1px solid var(--border); } textarea { width: 100%; height: 200px; padding: 10px; margin: 14px 0; padding-inline-start: var(--radius); border-radius: var(--radius); background: var(--code-bg); color: var(--primary); border: 1px solid var(--border); } Send me a message to hire me or get in touch about my projects

item.title: How to Build a Website for Your iOS App With Carrd
item.description: Carrd is an easy to use website building tool. You can quickly create well-designed landing page for your iOS app without coding to link to from the App Store.
